word: The sacrifices and offerings of the Mosaic ritual were ever pointing toward a better service, even a heavenly. The earthly sanctuary was \93a figure for the time then present,\94 in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices; its two holy places were \93patterns of things in the heavens;\94 for Christ, our great High Priest, is today \93a minister of the sanctuary, and of the true tabernacle, which the Lord pitched, and not man.\94 Hebrews 9:9, 23; 8:2.\97PK 684, 685.
